name: AFP Resistance-calculator
tagline: algorithm for calculating the resistance of any vehicle
body:
### Welcome to my resistance calculator.
All towers need to be able to determine the resistance that a vehicle will create during the recovery process.  This is a critical part of the safe and successful recovery.

### powerful calculator
Using a sophisticated algorithm this program will simplify the process as well as increasing the accuracy.

### Increase to operators safety
Through the use of this calculator, operators can work within their equipment's safe working load limits, while not having to struggle with over-sized rigging.    
Gone, will be the days when operators say:
     Hope this works!
     This should do it!
     Let's try this!

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
